definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: It then creates a single data feed from this aggregation.
sentences.chinese: 然後從這種聚合中創建單獨的數據提要。

sentences.english: This column ensures the most recently edited document is first in the feed.
sentences.chinese: 此列會確保最近編輯的文檔是提要中的第一個文檔。

sentences.english: It is a systematic project of communist party construction in China.
sentences.chinese: 內容提要黨的建設是一個系統的偉大工程。

sentences.english: Here are the headlines in today's news.
sentences.chinese: 現在播報今天的新聞提要。

sentences.english: After authenticating, the feed should now load correctly.
sentences.chinese: 身份驗證之後，提要就應該正確加載了。

sentences.english: You can also add bookmarks and feeds to the group.
sentences.chinese: 還可以向這個羣組添加書籤和提要。

sentences.english: It inherits the language context of feed and is otherwise nondescript.
sentences.chinese: 它需要繼承提要的語言上下文，否則不具備描述性。

sentences.english: First up today, a quick check of our headlines.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我們來快速看一下今天的新聞提要。

sentences.english: The news feed, too, will become part of the mobile experience.
sentences.chinese: 新聞提要也將會變成移動體驗的一部分。

sentences.english: The article was abstracted from a longer book.
sentences.chinese: 這篇文章是一本厚書的提要。

sentences.english: Great blog posts have subheadings, or bolded lists.
sentences.chinese: 偉大的博客必須要有提要和醒目的列表。

sentences.english: In reality, you can include a link that produces the output of this feed.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，您可以包括一個能夠生成此提要輸出的鏈接。

sentences.english: Feed sources input is the simplest component in this system.
sentences.chinese: 提要源輸入是這個系統中最簡單的組件。

sentences.english: Take back want, find a kozai first.
Want to know when this site is updated? Subscribe to Ember's RSS feed!
sentences.chinese: 要知道這個網站被更新了嗎？訂閱子玉的RSS提要。

sentences.english: Recall that this feed provides only a synopsis to the user.
sentences.chinese: 別忘了，此提要只爲用戶提供一個梗概。

definition: (often used in book or chapter titles) general introduction/overview
to collate and annotate/(on book titles) collated and annotated
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
see 龍龕手鑑|龙龛手鉴[Long2 kan1 Shou3 jian4]
